Title: Warmly welcome the founding of the revolutionary committee of Xinxiang Normal College!
Designer: Revolutionary Committee of Xinxiang Normal College (新乡师范学院革命委员会)
Notes: The slogan on the banner reads "Warmly welcome the founding of the revolutionary committee of Xinxiang Normal College!" (热烈欢呼新乡师范学院革命委员会成立!). The names plate reads "Revolutionary Committee of Xinxiang Normal College" (新乡师范学院革命委员会). Xinxiang is in Henan Province.
